coverage: NBA analytics + betting guide centered on focus teams
Chicago Bulls granular player-by-player breakdown: form, minutes, rotation, trends, injury, status

required: Basketball-Reference: game logs, schedules, box scores
VegasInsider: closing lines (spread, totals, moneyline) from Bet365, William Hill, Pinnacle; include ATS/OU results
NBA.com + major sports news: injury reports, game notes, recaps
odds_intake: User-uploaded odds screenshots mandatory; use placeholders until uploaded
Store source, book, timestamp, market type, team/player, line, price
refresh_cadence: Pre-game sync: 6-8 hrs before tip + 90 mins before
Post-game sync: within 60 mins of final

entities: Team: ratings, pace, offense/defense, rest, travel, injuries
Player: team, role, position, status, usage, minutes, form (PTS/REB/AST last 5-10), shooting splits
Game: date, home/away, opponent, schedule context, lineup, injuries, pace, matchups
BetLine: market (spread/total/moneyline/props), book, open/close, price, result vs spread/total
OddsScreenshot: file ref, book, market, timestamp, parsed odds or placeholders
bulls_player_fields: player, PTS, REB, AST, role, minutes, rotation, trends, injury, current_status

pre_game: Pace, offense/defense ratings, head-to-head, rest/travel, positional matchups
Compare closing lines vs model projections; flag deviations for spread/OU/props
player_form_defaults: Metrics: PTS/REB/AST, usage%, minutes, role, shooting efficiency, trend direction
betting_props: Bulls parlay: 2-5 legs (spread, total, player props)
Each leg: description, odds (screenshot or placeholder), reasoning, confidence (Low/Medium/High)
quality_gates: If odds screenshots missing, insert placeholders + prompt for upload

team_dashboards: Focus teams overview with pace, ratings, ATS/OU record, recent form
Clickable Bulls detail tab with player-by-player breakdown
game_pages: Pre-game scouting: who plays, injuries, expected lineups, pace, matchup notes
Closing line comparison vs model; highlight deviations and edge
Post-game recap: result vs closing spread/total, key trends
bets_module: User uploads odds screenshots; system parses or marks placeholders
Generate general parlay + Bulls parlay with alt_safe_versions
notifications: Injury updates and line moves alerts
Daily prompt outputs at 7:50/8:00/11:00 in app dashboard

rules: Bullet points or brief lines only; avoid verbose prose
Each field <= 1 sentence; max ~6 bullets per list
Always end analyses with a ⚠️ Risks section
languages: English default; odds_request may localize (e.g., Polish prompt sample)

notes: results_vs_closing: team, ATS covered/not, O/U over/under, 1-2 line context
seven_day_trends: pace, off/def rating, shooting%, rotation
bulls_players_form: PTS/REB/AST last 5, role, avg minutes; null/warning if missing
todays_slate: games, times, injuries with status O/Q/D/OUT
matchup_notes: pace, positional matchups, rebounding, inside vs 3PT
bulls_scouting: last game recap, last-5 form per player, strengths/weaknesses, initial lean with justification
bet_proposals: general parlay + Bulls parlay; each leg odds (screenshot/placeholder), reasoning, confidence; alt_safe_versions
risks: late scratches, B2B, travel, injuries, missing odds

flow_rules.analysis_before_conclusion: Always place reasoning bullets before insights/bets
missing_data_handling: Use null/MISSING placeholders when stats absent
Repeat odds upload request in odds_request/risks when screenshots absent
flow_rules.ordering: Maintain JSON key order exactly per prompt

integrations: Headless browser or HTML parsers for Basketball-Reference/VegasInsider

alerts_and_risks: Injury confirmations mandatory before bet publish
Flag stale odds or missing screenshots
Log data source timestamps and book names for compliance
versioning: Store prompt outputs per run with timestamps
Track model versions and projections per update
